properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. PIPELINE OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 15 APR BY
   M/V NORMAND CLIPPER, M/V SOLITAIRE AND
   M/V DEEP CONSTRUCTOR ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
   21-54.93S 039-48.49W AND 22-08.02S 040-05.34W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 230/12.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 16 APR.
